section:
Instead of sails, the wizards’ ship is propelled by a peculiar web of thin copper wires that produces a subsonic hum. You see the three wizards who command the ship standing in the prow, above a figurehead shaped like the snout of a sabre-spined dragon. Their long robes of blue and violet silk are decorated with patterns of silver filigree.
Attack the wizards Go alongside and hail them Sail on
